评论详情: The sizing isn’t clear on the product and is extremely fragile.

I’m not one to review but girl I have to throw in my 2 cents in. Over all this harness is good obviously you get for what you pay for so I knew there was a 50/50 chance of this happening but overall I enjoyed it it’s not to tight the adjustable strap is comfortable I just didn’t expect the clip to break off so quickly. I got it in the mail, everything was fine. I took it out the bag and put in on, I showed my boyfriend it was fine; literally lastnight Saturday I go to put in on and realized a part of a clip had chipped off so that was disappointed idk if I can fix it but im gonna see if I can, hopefully but other then that comment it’s alright you get for what you pay for so don’t expect nothing extravagant.

评论概述: China really needs to design fashion for Americans
评论详情: I has a 6 ft 2 in cosplayer ( Ranger and Barbarian ) who also works out and never misses a leg day. I have to tell you that this item was designed for an American 12 to 15 year old and not 18 to 54-year-old men and women. It's too bad I really do like the design but it's way too small.

This is a cute little addon for any cosplay, or to just add a few leather looking straps if that is your style. For my use case it works to add interest to a cyberpunk cosplay. The materials look fine for occasional use, but if you want it as daily fashion wear I imagine it will wear through soon enough. My only con here is that its a little pricier than I think it should be, but still worth picking up if it fits what you need.
